text: Stroke of genius may refer to: * Epiphany (feeling), an experience of a sudden and striking realization * Eureka effect, suddenly understanding a previously incomprehensible problem or concept * Flash of genius, an obsolete doctrine in US patent law ** Flash of Genius (film), a 2008 film about the legal doctrine * Bobby Jones: Stroke of Genius, a 2004 biographical drama film about golfer Bobby Jones
title: Stroke of genius
